title: Pittsburgh Events Calendar 2025/2026 | Pittsburgh Events
content:
# Pittsburgh Events

**Pittsburgh Events Calendar 2025/2026.**

We are the premier independent guide to all events in the city. Maximize your Pittsburgh experience with our comprehensive Events Calendar for this season! Find the best events and fun [things to do in Pittsburgh](https://pittsburgh.events/things-to-do/): [concerts](https://pittsburgh.events/concerts/), musicals, production [shows](https://pittsburgh.events/shows/), [sporting events](https://pittsburgh.events/sports/), comedy shows, and more. Use the calendar to search and choose your favorite events easily. Explore the most complete information about entertainment events currently playing in the city. Get your primary, discount, and resale tickets, all 100% guaranteed, and they may be priced above or below face value. Discover Pittsburgh in different and vivid shades!

Start Date

Oct 5, 2025

Reset

Cancel

Apply

End Date

Oct 10, 2025

Category

All EventsConcertsTheaterSports

**Find the best Pittsburgh events in February 2026.**

[Pittsburgh.events](https://pittsburgh.events/) is your guide to epic events: [concerts](https://pittsburgh.events/concerts/), [shows](https://pittsburgh.events/shows/), musicals, family events, opera, and [sporting events](https://pittsburgh.events/sports/) to experience while in town. content:
# Pittsburgh Events Calendar

**‘ [Pittsburgh Events](https://pittsburgh.events/)’ is your official guide to all events in the city and around Pittsburgh, PA.**

Utilize this comprehensive calendar to discover many activities and things to do in Pittsburgh, including mesmerizing [concerts](https://pittsburgh.events/concerts/), breathtaking [Broadway shows](https://pittsburgh.events/shows/), theatrical productions, ballet performances, family-friendly shows, operas, comedy shows, electrifying [sports events](https://pittsburgh.events/sports/), and so much more. Our user-friendly calendar function makes it effortless to browse and select events that cater to your preferences. Find the best of today’s events, this weekend, and this month. With a broad selection of premium seating, you’ve ensured an optimal experience. Secure 100% guaranteed tickets for every upcoming event in Pittsburgh at the most competitive prices. Don’t miss out on the best events this season.

title: Pittsburgh Entertainment Venues: Upcoming Events & Tickets
content:
# Pittsburgh Entertainment Venues

**Discover the best entertainment venues in Pittsburgh, PA.**

Vibrant Music Venues: Discover Pittsburgh’s bustling music scene, with venues that cater to every taste. From intimate jazz clubs to grand concert halls, there’s a melody for every ear. Theatrical Extravaganzas: Step into the world of drama and dance at Pittsburgh’s theaters. Watch timeless classics and modern masterpieces come to life on stage. Arenas and Stadium Events: Experience the thrill of live sports and mega-concerts at Pittsburgh’s arenas and stadiums. These venues play host to big-ticket events, promising unforgettable memories. Get the best deals on [sporting events](https://pittsburgh.events/sports/), [concerts](https://pittsburgh.events/concerts/), [shows](https://pittsburgh.events/shows/), and other epic [events in Pittsburgh](https://pittsburgh.events/).

# Pittsburgh Events June 2026

**Find the best Pittsburgh events in June 2026.**

[Pittsburgh.events](https://pittsburgh.events/) is your guide to epic events: [concerts](https://pittsburgh.events/concerts/), [shows](https://pittsburgh.events/shows/), musicals, family events, opera, and [sporting events](https://pittsburgh.events/sports/) to experience while in town. title: Pittsburgh Sporting Events 2025/2026
content:
# Pittsburgh Sporting Events

**Explore the Comprehensive 2025/2026 Sports Event Calendar!**

Stay updated with our daily revised, all-encompassing schedule of sporting events in Pittsburgh, PA. Easily find and purchase tickets for your preferred sports, complete with detailed schedules and seating plans. Featuring popular venues like [PNC Park](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/pnc-park/), [Monongalia County Ballpark](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/monongalia-county-ballpark/), [Petersen Events Center](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/petersen-events-center/), [Acrisure Stadium](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/acrisure-stadium-formerly-heinz-field/), [PPG Paints Arena](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/ppg-paints-arena/), [Wesbanco Arena](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/wesbanco-arena/), and [Petersen Events Center](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/petersen-events-center/), we offer a wide selection of prime locations for an unmatched sporting experience. title: Concerts in Pittsburgh - Schedule & Tickets 2025/2026
content:
# Pittsburgh Concerts

**Browse the official schedule of all current and upcoming concerts in Pittsburgh 2025/2026.**

Pittsburgh is one of the hottest locations for concert tours in the US. Some popular venues for concerts in the city include [PPG Paints Arena](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/ppg-paints-arena/), [Benedum Center](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/benedum-center/), [Heinz Hall](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/heinz-hall/), [Carnegie of Homestead Music Hall](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/carnegie-of-homestead-music-hall/), [Club Cafe](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/club-cafe/), [Thunderbird Cafe](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/thunderbird-cafe/), [Hard Rock Cafe](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/hard-rock-cafe-pittsburgh/), and more. The schedule for the concerts in the city is revised daily. Don’t miss out on your favorite concerts and shows today, this weekend, and this month. Get your primary, discount, and resale tickets, all 100% guaranteed, and they may be priced above or below face value. Discover Pittsburgh in different and vivid shades!

# Pittsburgh Ballet Theatre Tickets

**Browse the schedule of all current and upcoming Pittsburgh Ballet Theatre performances in the 2025/2026 season.**

Pittsburgh Ballet’s mission is to excite, enrich, and entertain its diverse audience through an imaginative presentation of classical and contemporary dance. Dance in Pittsburgh Ballet ranges from classic ballet performances to cutting-edge companies performing modern dance. ‘ [Pittsburgh.Events](https://pittsburgh.events/)‘ offers the largest selection of ballet tickets in the city. Ticket prices for some performances start as low as $60. Discover the best Pittsburgh Ballet performances this season. Find the best seats and buy verified tickets for upcoming performances at the lowest price. Don’t miss out on your favorite performances this season.

title: Pittsburgh Concerts February 2026 | Concert Tickets
content:
# Pittsburgh Concerts February 2026

**Browse the schedule of all current and upcoming events this month.**

With ‘[Pittsburgh Events](https://pittsburgh.events/)‘, you gain unparalleled access to an extensive array of must-attend events this season. The city offers something for everyone, from concerts’ electrifying atmosphere to music festivals’ rhythmic beats. Some popular concert venues in the town include [Benedum Center](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/benedum-center/), [Heinz Hall](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/heinz-hall/), [Carnegie of Homestead Music Hall](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/carnegie-of-homestead-music-hall/), [Club Cafe](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/club-cafe/), [Thunderbird Cafe](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/thunderbird-cafe/), [Hard Rock Cafe](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/hard-rock-cafe-pittsburgh/), and more. title: Pittsburgh Concerts April 2026 | Concert Tickets
content:
# Pittsburgh Concerts April 2026

**Browse the schedule of all current and upcoming events this month.**

With ‘[Pittsburgh Events](https://pittsburgh.events/)‘, you gain unparalleled access to an extensive array of must-attend events this season. The city offers something for everyone, from concerts’ electrifying atmosphere to music festivals’ rhythmic beats. Some popular concert venues in the town include [Benedum Center](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/benedum-center/), [Heinz Hall](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/heinz-hall/), [Carnegie of Homestead Music Hall](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/carnegie-of-homestead-music-hall/), [Club Cafe](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/club-cafe/), [Thunderbird Cafe](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/thunderbird-cafe/), [Hard Rock Cafe](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/hard-rock-cafe-pittsburgh/), and more. title: Fun and Best Things to Do in Pittsburgh, PA
content:
# Things to Do in Pittsburgh

**Explore Maximum Best & Fun Things To Do in Pittsburgh, PA.**

Pittsburgh, known as the Steel City, offers a vibrant mix of activities that cater to a wide array of interests. From music festivals to sports events, there’s always something happening in this dynamic city. Here’s your guide to the best and most fun things to do in Pittsburgh. With amusement star-studded [concerts](https://pittsburgh.events/concerts/), [theater shows](https://pittsburgh.events/shows/), exciting [sports](https://pittsburgh.events/sports/), tours, excursions, and more, you’ll never run out of things to do in the city. Don’t miss the best upcoming events today, tomorrow, this weekend, and next week. Discover the city in different and vivid shades! Here are some of the best things to do in Pittsburgh, PA.

Contents

Upcoming Events

Overview

# Pittsburgh Concerts July 2026

**Browse the schedule of all current and upcoming events this month.**

With ‘[Pittsburgh Events](https://pittsburgh.events/)‘, you gain unparalleled access to an extensive array of must-attend events this season. # Pittsburgh Events This Weekend

**Discover the Best Events in Pittsburgh This Weekend – Your Ultimate Guide!**

Planning a weekend in Pittsburgh, PA? Look no further! Our comprehensive guide, ‘ [Pittsburgh.Events](https://pittsburgh.events/)‘, offers the largest selection of tickets for a diverse array of events. Whether you’re eager to catch the latest [theater shows](https://pittsburgh.events/shows/), and [concerts](https://pittsburgh.events/concerts/), laugh out loud at comedy shows, experience the thrill of [sports events](https://pittsburgh.events/sports/), or enjoy memorable activities with friends and family, we’ve got you covered. Browse our schedule to find your perfect event and secure your tickets with a 100% guarantee at unbeatable prices. Don’t miss out on the excitement in Pittsburgh this weekend!

title: Pittsburgh Concerts June 2026 | Concert Tickets
content:
# Pittsburgh Concerts June 2026

**Browse the schedule of all current and upcoming events this month.**

With ‘[Pittsburgh Events](https://pittsburgh.events/)‘, you gain unparalleled access to an extensive array of must-attend events this season. The city offers something for everyone, from concerts’ electrifying atmosphere to music festivals’ rhythmic beats. Some popular concert venues in the town include [Benedum Center](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/benedum-center/), [Heinz Hall](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/heinz-hall/), [Carnegie of Homestead Music Hall](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/carnegie-of-homestead-music-hall/), [Club Cafe](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/club-cafe/), [Thunderbird Cafe](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/thunderbird-cafe/), [Hard Rock Cafe](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/hard-rock-cafe-pittsburgh/), and more. Secure your spot with 100% guaranteed tickets at the most competitive prices. Join us in discovering Pittsburgh’s dynamic and vibrant spirit in June 2026.

title: Pittsburgh Events November 2025: Concerts, Shows, Sports
content:
# Pittsburgh Events November 2025

**Find the best Pittsburgh events in November 2025.**

[Pittsburgh.events](https://pittsburgh.events/) is your guide to epic events: [concerts](https://pittsburgh.events/concerts/), [shows](https://pittsburgh.events/shows/), musicals, family events, opera, and [sporting events](https://pittsburgh.events/sports/) to experience while in town. title: Pittsburgh Concerts August 2026 | Concert Tickets
content:
# Pittsburgh Concerts August 2026

**Browse the schedule of all current and upcoming events this month.**

With ‘[Pittsburgh Events](https://pittsburgh.events/)‘, you gain unparalleled access to an extensive array of must-attend events this season. The city offers something for everyone, from concerts’ electrifying atmosphere to music festivals’ rhythmic beats. Some popular concert venues in the town include [Benedum Center](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/benedum-center/), [Heinz Hall](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/heinz-hall/), [Carnegie of Homestead Music Hall](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/carnegie-of-homestead-music-hall/), [Club Cafe](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/club-cafe/), [Thunderbird Cafe](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/thunderbird-cafe/), [Hard Rock Cafe](https://pittsburgh.events/venue/hard-rock-cafe-pittsburgh/), and more. Find your favorite events, check seating charts, buy tickets, and how to get there.
